body_html: Also: we "soft-deprecated" certain columns during the preparation for this year's selection process with the promise to then remove them. I would after this is merged go ahead and do this in order to get rid of these "legacy columns" before this year's team starts working on the app.
body_text: Also: we "soft-deprecated" certain columns during the preparation for this year's selection process with the promise to then remove them. I would after this is merged go ahead and do this in order to get rid of these "legacy columns" before this year's team starts working on the app.
body: Also: we "soft-deprecated" certain columns during the preparation for this year's selection process with the promise to then remove them. I would after this is merged go ahead and do this in order to get rid of these "legacy columns" before this year's team starts working on the app.
